name: Piracy
description:
This is a multiplayer, first person, pirate experience, where the players will battle one another in teams of two on a quest to plunder and loot the other ships. Command your crew and control your ship to better the enemy team.

Thank you so much for visiting and playing our demo!! I really hope you enjoyed and are looking forward to more!

Please click here to take part in our Open Survey, it will really help us out in our development journey.

If you would like access to some of our latest content and to play test the multiplayer just DM one of my associates or myself on Instagram or Twitter. You can find us @arantimon @ricardogoul & @cromto_gaming on Instagram or @cromto on Twitter!

Have a great a and catch you on the up side!
